categories.title: Iconic Plazas
items: Puerta del Sol - The absolute center of Spain (Kilometer Zero), home to the Tío Pepe sign and Bear statue
Plaza Mayor - Grand central square with beautiful arcaded buildings, perfect for people-watching
Plaza de Colón - Impressive monuments honoring Christopher Columbus with fountains and Spanish flag
Plaza de Cibeles - Stunning fountain and palace, one of Madrid's most photographed spots
Plaza de España - Large square with Cervantes monument, recently renovated

categories.title: Monuments & Gates
items: Puerta de Alcalá - Madrid's most iconic neoclassical monument at the entrance to Retiro Park
Templo de Debod - Ancient Egyptian temple with spectacular sunset views
Fuente de Neptuno - Beautiful fountain at Paseo del Prado, celebration spot for Atlético Madrid fans
Estatua del Oso y el Madroño - Madrid's symbol at Puerta del Sol

categories.title: Emblematic Buildings
items: Edificio Metrópolis - Stunning Beaux-Arts building with distinctive dome, most photographed in Madrid
Palacio Real - One of Europe's largest royal palaces with over 3,000 rooms
Banco de España - Magnificent 19th-century building housing Spain's central bank
Palacio de Cibeles - Former post office, now Madrid's City Hall with rooftop viewpoint
Gran Vía Buildings - Art Deco and early 20th-century architecture along Madrid's Broadway
Edificio Telefónica - Historic skyscraper on Gran Vía, first high-rise in Europe

categories.title: Churches & Religious Sites
items: Catedral de la Almudena - Madrid's cathedral next to the Royal Palace
Basílica de San Francisco el Grande - Impressive dome and art collection
Iglesia de San Ginés - Historic church near Sol, beautiful baroque interior
Convento de las Descalzas Reales - 16th-century convent with stunning art collection

categories.title: Parks & Gardens
items: Parque del Retiro - Madrid's green lung with Crystal Palace, lake, and gardens
Jardines de Sabatini - Formal gardens next to Royal Palace
Campo del Moro - Palace gardens with peacocks and romantic pathways
Jardín Botánico - Beautiful botanical garden near the Prado
Madrid Río - Modern riverside park along the Manzanares

categories.title: Markets
items: Mercado de San Miguel - Gourmet market near Plaza Mayor, perfect for tapas
Mercado de San Antón - Modern market in Chueca with rooftop terrace
El Rastro - Famous Sunday flea market in La Latina (Sundays only)
